name: The Great Escape (itch) (HongyuanZhang-UA)
description: You are a reporter who infiltrated a suspect's home to collect evidence in order to find out the truth about an incident. But just as you were about to find out, the suspect spotted you, to prevent you from sending the message out and knocking you out and trapping you in his home. After all this was done, the suspect got a call and went out. You woke up while he was out and found you in his study. Now, you need to do everything possible to escape from his home and reveal the truth of the matter. Everything around you can be a clue to help you escape. But be aware that the suspect may return anytime, and you need to act quickly. Otherwise, your life will not be guaranteed.
